projects.name: Smart Door Lock System
projects.description: Developed a sophisticated door lock system utilizing Arduino microcontroller, RFID technology, and fingerprint recognition for enhanced security and convenience. Created a user-friendly interface using LEDs to display system status (Locked, Unlocked, Access Denied). Future Developments:- Continuing to explore opportunities for further refinement, such as integrating remote access and advanced security features.

Implemented user authentication, data persistence, and RESTful APIs, earning a commendation from the project supervisor for innovation and code quality.
